answers.answer: Hello,There are many possibilities for your symptoms .It can be due to anemia,gastrointestinal pathology like gastritis ,gastroenteritis,addison’s disease,liver pathology like fatty liver disease,hepatitis,diabetes,chronic infections,hypercalcemia,psychological problems like anxiety or depression and hypoparathyroidism.In any case with loss of appetite,liver pathology is a must to be evaluated.I sincerely advise you to consult a physician and get yourself thoroughly investigated for the above possibilities.In the meantime,try taking some multivitamins and iron supplements and eat healthy,nutritious food.Hope it helps. Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing or if you have any additional queries.

question: hellofor a few weeks now i have had no appitite this has gone on for about a month nowi am forcing food inside me as i dont want it     i feel sick   usually im a very good eateri am tired all the time    i go to bed sleep for hours get up and i feel uselessdoes any body have any idea what it could be please
title: tired no energy lathargic nausea no appitite
